StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateSMCRReserveUnitNumVisits]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SMCRReserveUnitID uniqueiden..er, @NumVisitsPlanned smallint, @NumContractGoal smallint, @UserLogin varchar(50)
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [MCRISS].[USMC].[SMCRReserveUnit] cvd where [SMCRReserveUnitID] = @SMCRReserveUnitID ) -- then update the exisi.ng record BEGIN
UPDATE [MCRISS].[USMC].[SMCRReserveUnit] SET [NumVisitsPlanned] = @NumVisitsPlanned, [ContractGoal]= @NumContractGoal, [UserLogin] = @UserLogin, [UpdateDate] = GetDate() WHERE [SMCRReserveUnitID] = @SMCRReserveUnitID
END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
